These are the complete range of Pentra-Sil products used by


The transformation of concrete into an aesthetic, long-lasting floor or exterior surface begins with hardening, densifying and sealing the surface at time of placement. From the moment it is placed, interior concrete needs protection against spills, stains and hard-to-remove curing compounds. Likewise, exterior concrete needs immediate protection from freeze-thaw cycles, de-icers, moisture and chloride intrusion.

PENTRA-SIL (HD+C)
HARDENER, DENSIFIER AND CURE

PENTRA-HARD® DENSIFIER
LITHIUM CONCRETE HARDENER, DUST PROOFER, SEALER

PENTRA-SIL® (HD) HARDENER, DENSIFIER AND SEALER

High performance stain and wear protection clear coats for concrete, marble, terrazzo, and other porous stone surfaces, improve appearance and reduce maintenance.
Preserve existing surfaces from wear, abrasion, accidental spills, and harsh environmental elements such as freeze-thaw scaling, spalling, salt and water intrusion, and the damaging effects of alkalis such as surface sweating, ASR and carbonation.

PENTRA-HARD® GUARD HIGH-GLOSS STAIN AND WEAR PROTECTOR

PENTRA-FINISH® (LG) ADVANCED, LOW-GLOSS STAIN AND WEAR PROTECTION FINISH

PENTRA-FINISH® (HG) ADVANCED, HIGH-GLOSS STAIN AND WEAR PROTECTION FINISH

Cleaning and preserving your flooring surface with the correct products wil lower your total maintenance costs. Safely clean and protect your surfaces with daily cleaning and periodic use of restorers that infuse the surface with reactive lithium. Products can be mopped on or used in an automatic scrubber.

PENTRA-CLEAN™ (DC) DAILY CLEANER

PENTRA-CLEAN™ (CR) CLEANER RESTORER

PENTRA® (PCF) LIQUID PORE AND MICRO-CRACK FILLER
